name: Highway Car Shooting Rider
description:
Highway Shootout is about shooting, racing the traffic, avoiding obstacles, collecting weapons/ power-ups/coins and blowing up the cars in your way. Unlock Weapons, Worlds and Cars as your cross the distance. Upgrade your weapons and power ups.

Play and Enjoy this busy highway Shoot Out ensued and the entire nation will witnessed the most talked about daylight highway encounter turning it into a virtual war zone.

Free Unlock-able:
> 13 Weapons of mass destruction
> 4 Vehicles of the Apocalypse
> 10 Skins for Each Car.
> 3 worlds to Explore


Features:
> Simple Game play with Easy and Smooth Controls.
> Vibrant Sound effects for Crashed, Strikes, Hits and Whacks etc
> Pick Powers ups like Coin 2X and Magnet Power while driving.
> Neat and realistic graphics
> Full Free to play and fun action Game


Please leave a rating and give your feedback so we can further improve the game.
